comments:
This is probably happens on background task synchronization. Running 0.8 release with Eclipse 3.2.1

-- Error Log --
Date: Sun Oct 22 17:19:52 BST 2006
Message: Widget is disposed
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.ui
Stack Trace:

I have seen this happen once a long time ago.  I don't know what leads to the exception or how to trigger it, and have no indication yet that the error is on our end not with the Platform.  For now I have added a try/catch block that will handle this case gracefully, but we should watch the error log for Info messages to this effect.
*** Bug 161879 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
